snippet: Brandon Weeden replaced the injured Brian Hoyer and rallied Cleveland to a win over Buffalo, which also lost its starting quarterback, the rookie E. J. Manuel, to an injury.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns defeat Buffalo Bills, 37-24; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS, BEN SHPIGEL and ZACH SCHONBRUN

lead_paragraph: Brandon Weeden replaced the injured Brian Hoyer and rallied Cleveland to a win over Buffalo, which also lost its starting quarterback, the rookie E. J. Manuel, to an injury.

headline.main: Weeden Leads Browns Past the Bills
headline.print_headline: Weeden Leads Browns Past the Bills
